TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content:
Ace Combat is so unrealistic!!!

Edited June 6 by TwoCalories
[NEW PAGE]

The only true air combat simulators are LHX by EA and F-19/F-117 by Microprose.
Everything else are pathetic attempts.
I thought the best plane simulator was in GTA Liberty City.

You are confusing it with Saints' Row III.

Which is, btw, in any sense better than that GTA.

At least because you can customize your character instead of possessing the cadaver of an ugly criminal.
I think that if I said an official literally crucified someone that I would be held to ridicule.
It's the last day on Earth.
"Actually, it's called the Thunderbolt II, not the Warthog."
reminded me of the warthogs to pun.
Is it "KitBash" or "KitHack"?

The word "to smell" can mean both "to stink" and "to feel the stink".
Literally it means "somebody here needs a bath".

Why does the Griffindor faculty exist?

No, it's not for the defenders, for the heroes...

It's because a university must have some amount of ballast for the football team, while the talented Ravenclaw students study, and the hardworking Hufflepuff students hardwork.

Why does the Slytherin faculty exist?

Because the football team need some mannequins to beat them up.

Edited June 19 by kerbiloid
Hairy Porker, Hamoine and Rind, were great friends at the Hogsbreath school of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
The Weasleys are indeed losers.
You get what you promote.
The servers are being removed one by one.
The hoster tariff plan is cheaper and cheaper.

NASA fixed Voyager 1 in six months besides the damned thing being more than 22 light hours away from Earth.

They could not fix KSP bugs in 10 years, working on the very same planet as everybody else.

There is no Voyager 1.
They were using Celestia to visualise the skybox, and now they don't need even it.
The droplet counter on the roof is enough to generate its scientific data.
There is no space, we are all on a big rock that is in a hollowed out rock with stars painted on it. They pretend to go places in order to get funding.
NASA = "No Actual Space Around"
KSP Enhanced Edition.

KSP-2: Judgement Day

to be released soon
KSP Dark Fate.

Quote

Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning. — Rick Cook, The Wizardry Compiled
